Title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Movie - Pyramid of Light
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Thriller
Writer: Masahiro Hikokubo (original story), Michael Pecoriello, Kazuki Takahashi (concept), Junki Takegami (original story)
Actors: Gregory Abbey, Sebastian Arcelus, Ben Baron, Amy Birnbaum
Plot: Underneath the sands of Egypt, Anubis, an ancient evil spirit, has awakened. It's up to Yugi, who defeated Anubis centuries ago, to use his skill and determination to rid the world of evil once again.
